base_description: Cylindrical silver spray can with blue nozzle.
part_description: Features a cylindrical body, a domed top with a blue nozzle. The body is silver, and the nozzle is positioned centrally on top.
internal_interaction_description: The nozzle, when pressed, releases the pressurized contents stored inside the can. The internal valve system controls the flow of the contents, ensuring a consistent spray pattern. The pressure inside the can propels the liquid through the nozzle.
external_interaction_description: The spray can is used by pressing the nozzle, which releases the contents onto a surface. It interacts with external elements by covering surfaces with paint or other substances, depending on its contents. Users must handle it carefully to avoid accidental discharge.
